rubric: +20 same allowed-tools surface (Skill, TodoWrite, Read, Bash)

candidates.why: Closest orchestrator: phased plan flow, same tool surface, same session artifact patterns, and similar conflict-resolution + task-generation chain.
Planning-focused command with explicit artifacts and phases; differs by exploration/clarification loop and extra flags.
Orchestrator with session folder outputs; differs by multi-agent delegation and AskUserQuestion-driven decision points.
Verification phase reference (reporting + artifact validation) used as a follow-up quality gate after planning.
Session/task lifecycle command that manipulates existing plan/task artifacts; useful for recovery/edit patterns but not primary planning generation.

selected.why: Best match for phased orchestrator structure and shared workflow session artifact model; extend with TDD-specific compliance + validation phases.
